Subject: Urgent Payment Request for Overdue Invoice

Dear [Recipient],

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring to your attention an overdue invoice that is currently pending payment from your end. Our records indicate that Invoice #123456, dated [Date], with a total amount of [Amount], is now past its due date.

As a valued customer, we understand that unforeseen circumstances may have caused a delay in processing this payment. However, we kindly request that you prioritize settling this outstanding invoice as soon as possible to avoid any further complications.

Please be advised that failure to make payment within the next 24 hours will result in additional late fees being applied to the total amount owed. We would like to avoid any unnecessary penalties and maintain a positive working relationship with your organization.

To facilitate a swift resolution, I have attached a copy of the invoice for your reference. You can make the payment via [Payment Method] to the following account details:

Account Name: [Vendor Name]
Account Number: [Account Number]
Bank Name: [Bank Name]
Routing Number: [Routing Number]

Once payment has been made, please provide us with a confirmation receipt for our records.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. We appreciate your prompt cooperation in resolving this issue. Should you have any questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me directly at [Vendor Contact Information].

We look forward to receiving your payment at the earliest convenience.

Warm regards,

[Vendor Name]
[Vendor Contact Information]
